actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to restrict political activity of officers and employees of the District of Columbia by act of the Council of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Council of the District of Columbia to exempt by Act any officer or class or group of employees of the District of Columbia from any provision of subchapter III of chapter 73 of title 5, United States Code (relating to political activities of Federal employees) if the Council has enacted a similar provision which applies to such officer or class or group of employees, or to other employees of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to restrict political activity of officers and employees of the District of Columbia by act of the Council of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
